column4: Dell's got a page saying how great ubuntu is! That's a big step up from a huge warning that you probably want windows unless you really know what you're doing. Please digg it so it can make the front page: http://digg.com/d31TxXw
I bet Dell will experience some hostility with Microsoft now
I'm assuming part of the reason dell is shipping ubuntu is to prove to M$ that they can sell computers without windows. And then hopefully negotiate for a better price on windows
